library(RMySQL)

cn <- dbConnect(RMySQL::MySQL(), 
          
                username = user, 
                password = password, 
                host = "shredsleds.ch4frojqjmlp.us-west-2.rds.amazonaws.com", 
                port = 3306,
                dbname = "bikes"
                )
